name: Joan of Arc [Fireworks]
skill: Restores 1020/1220 HP to all allies. Targets deal 30%/36% more DMG for a limited time.
ability: Restores HP to the ally with the lowest percentage of HP at the start of each wave.

additional_data.description: The spirit of a saint who fought for her homeland. Despite a troubled past, Joan of Arc lives up to her saintly reputation after having returned to her gentle self. Joan was intrigued by the idea of a fireworks festival when Sola extended her an invitation to attend. Unfamiliar with modern fireworks, Joan is unaware of how they work. She has been seen desperately trying to set off store-bought rockets with nothing but her spirit essence.
additional_data.how_to_acquire:
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Get a First Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Get a Second Half Ranking of 2500 and above.
◦ "The Great Fireworks Showdown" Event: Get a Total Ranking of 5000 and above.
additional_data.notes_and_trivia: ◦ Slightly increases the total Event Points during the "The Great Fireworks Showdown" event.

main: "I've never known a fire to feel so inviting."
summon: "Shall we purchase some fireworks after the mission?"
limit_break: "I fight to protect the fire around which all are welcome."
